section.name: How to install.
section.p: You need JavaServer Page engine such as Tomcat.

ol.li: Download war file in download page. And rename to 'chipchat.war'.
Open web page http://127.0.0.1/chipchat/ or http://127.0.0.1:8080/chipchat/ in web browser.

section.name: How to compile source.(For developer.)
section.p: You need j2sdk(http://java.sun.com) and Maven(http://maven.apache.org) to compile source

blockquote.p: Download source in download page and unzip file. Or source can be got by checkout from CVS server.(Cvs documents)
Compiled war file is located in 'target/chipchat.war' and documents are locate in 'target/docs' directory.
